definitions.body: ask, ask for, acc. rei (vel pers.) definitions.title: Hiph. b.
definitions.body: specif. ask as a favour, for temporary use, i.e. borrow (cf. [[לָוׇה]], as matter of business, v. Bu:1Sa 1:28), Ex 22:13 (E; acc. rei + [[מֵעִם]] pers.), 2Ki 4:3 (acc. rei + [[מִן]] of source + [[ל]] pers. reflex.), 2Ki 6:5 (pt. pass. abs.); so also (acc. to many), c. acc. rei Ex 3:22( + [[מִן]] pers.), Ex 11:2, Ex 12:35 (both + [[מֵאֵת]] pers. ; all E),—it is, however, not clear that there was any pretext of mere temporary use; pt. pass. ´[[שָׁאוּל לי]]: 1Sa 1:28 (lent, granted,) made over to ´[[י]]: (in effect pass. of Hiph., q.v.).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: in weakened sense, seek, desire (late), c. acc. 2Ch 11:23, Ec 2:10 (subj. [[עֵינַי]]); Pr 20:4 in harvest he shall look [for a crop], [[וׇאָָיִן]] and there shall be none.
